docs.lead_paragraph: Haleh Esfandiari’s lawyer says that Iranian authorities still hold the scholar’s passport, but that by Iranian law, she should be permitted to leave Iran.

headline.main: Legal Questions Remain for Freed Scholar in Iran
headline.print_headline: Freed Scholar Waits to See if Iran Will Let Her Leave the Country

docs.snippet: Haleh Esfandiari’s lawyer says that Iranian authorities still hold the scholar’s passport, but that by Iranian law, she should be permitted to leave Iran.

byline.contributor: Nazila Fathi reported from Tehran, and Neil MacFarquhar from New York.
byline.original: By NAZILA FATHI and NEIL MacFARQUHAR

docs.lead_paragraph: “Snapshots" has a gutsy, self-confident, liberal determination that smacks of bygone idealism. The result is not always great theater.

headline.main: Rebels of Various Ages, All of Them With a Cause
headline.print_headline: Rebels of Various Ages, All of Them With a Cause

docs.snippet: “Snapshots" has a gutsy, self-confident, liberal determination that smacks of bygone idealism. The result is not always great theater.
